OOC: Although it's my team, I've got to say this. It's okay to have a diffe=
rent character fire at the character another fired at last post, but every =
post is just a ridiculous amount of firepower for them to avoid, and should=
n't really happen...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: gunthers8@net=
scape.net 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, July 11, 2001 2=
:41 AM
  Subject: Re: Clash


  hey orchid....i am not a moderator or anyth=
ing but i think you have to be more fair...right now your chars are attacki=
ng everyone each turn.....you have to make one reply to all the posts to wh=
o your characters attack and it can't always be everyone who shoots at them=
...once again i am not part of the cuoncil so my word means nothing, but js=
ut think about k thanx...


  nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com wrote:
  >

 / BARRYMORE / STILLER / ALBA
  > 
  > 
  >

the grenades and jumps over the minigun shots. She fires 2 missiles at Seek=
ker...)
  > 
  > 
  >

he minigun shots. She fires 3 laser beams at Seekker...)
  > 
  > 
  > 
  >=
 (Stiller is hit by the minigun blast. He pulls his crossbow out and fires =
2 arrows at Seekker. Then he puts his crossbow back in it's holster and ext=
ends his middle finger towards Seekker. He turns back to Arrow.)
  > 
  > 
=
  > 
  > Stiller: I want this to be a fair fight. That means I don't want n=
one of those Chivtrons butting in. You tell your team mates to back off, an=
d I'm sure mine will have no problem with giving me this fight...
  > 
  > =

  > 
  > (Stiller awaits an answer from Arrow...)
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > (Alba=
 is struck by minigun blasts. She growls and jerks a long rod from a holste=
r on her back. It has a large handle and the tip was jagged and spiked. The=
 handle was a yellow but the rod was a cold grey. Alba extends her arm, tak=
ing aim, and firing a jolt of electricity at Seekker...)
  >

ginal Message -----

  > To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.c=
om

  > Seekker ran up to the pod diving behind it rolling along the ground 
=
  > until beside Axis. He looks both ways then up and down. Now looking at =

  > Axis stares him in the eyes. The small bot grabs at Axis face with bot=
h 
  > hands. "THIS IS WAR BOY. THIS ISN'T YOUR PANSY ACCADEMY TRAINING, TH=
IS 
  > IS THE REAL THING. NOW LITSEN TO ME, PRIVATE, I WANT YOU TO GET OUT=
 
  > THERE AND SHOW THOSE ENEMY'S HOW FAR OVER THE LINE THEY ARE. YOU GOT =

  > THAT YOU PIECE OF PRIVATE PISTONS." he yelled at Axis believeing he 
 =
 > himself was a war general. He then looked straigh back from the pod. 
  =
> "Bring it on..." he said. He then turned jumping up onto the top of the 
=
  > pod, his two miniguns under each arm ringing out 20 shots each. Both 
 =
 > his hands carried small explosive grenades. Throwing one at Barrymore 
 =
 > and the other at McGowan. The crazy shots from his minigun fly toward 
 =
 > McGowan, Barrymore, Stiller and Alba in very bad accuracy. "HAR HAR. YOU=
 
  > REBELS WILL LEARN A LESSON, SEEKKER STYLE" Seekker still stood atop t=
he 
  > pod.

nxiz ---

ng most of the

ral bullets dug
  > > into her armour, and glanced off of her back. She sta=
ys on the
  > > ground, and notices Nightlight being approached by Depp. A
=
  > > growing sense of doom builds as she gets to her feet and fires two
  =
> > disks at Depp. Immediately after firing the disks, she puts her gun
  >=
 > away and starts to sprint towards Depp thinking, <<I can't let this
  > =
> happen...>> as she prepares for close combat mode. Her claws
  > > extend=
 from her hands with a metallic ringing.
  > > 
  > > Axis, not sure what t=
o do, waits behind the pod, hoping that the
  > > heavy heat resistant re-e=
ntry armour on the pod will hold out for this
  > > battle. Without looking=
, he yells, "LOKK?" Wanting to make sure
  > > that Lokk is ok.

> Lokk creaps around, weaving through trees. Exiting the forest, he

ids behind a near by rock. Keeping low to the ground, he crawls

 still trying to get behind the enemy and he's almost there.
